query.prompt:
This text is written in Hungarian. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Életünk útjának felén 9 elmondom a többi dolgot, amit ott láttam. 28 Miután kissé megpihentettem fáradt testemet, 67 Felelte nekem: „Nem ember, ember voltam egykor,
query.result: | Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Case | Number | Person | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Életünk | élet | noun | nominative | sg. | 1 | | | | | útjának | út | noun | genitive | sg. | 3 | | | | | felén | fél | noun | adessive | sg. | 3 | | | | | elmondom | elmond | verb | 1 | sg. | 1 | present | indicative | | | a | a | definite article | accusative | sg. | 3 | | | | | többi | többi | adjective | accusative | sg. | 3 | | | | | dolgot | dolog | noun | accusative | sg. | 3 | | | | | amit | ami | pronoun | accusative | sg. | 3 | | | | | ott | ott | adverb | | | | | | | | láttam | lát | verb | 1 | sg. | 1 | past | indicative | | | Miután | miután | conjunction | | | | | | | | kissé | kissé | adverb | | | | | | | | megpihentettem | megpihentet | verb | 1 | sg. | 1 | past | indicative | | | fáradt | fáradt | adjective | accusative | sg. | 3 | | | | | testemet | test | noun | accusative | sg. | 1 | | | | | Felelte | felel | verb | 3 | sg. | 3 | past | indicative | | | nekem | én | pronoun | dative | sg. | 1 | | | | | Nem | nem | adverb | | | | | | | | ember | ember | noun | nominative | sg. | 3 | | | | | ember | ember | noun | nominative | sg. | 1 | | | | | voltam | volt | verb | 1 | sg. | 1 | past | indicative | | | egykor | egykor | adverb | | | | | | |

query.prompt:
Create a word table.
4 Ó, milyen nehéz elmondani, milyen volt 5 ez a vad, durva és erős erdő, 6 amelynek gondolata is újra félelmet kelt!

query.prompt:

7 Olyan keserű, hogy alig több a halálnál; 8 de hogy beszéljek a jóról, amit ott találtam, 9 elmondom a többi dolgot, amit ott láttam.
